text: @Alyssa_Milano @CAPAction US hospitals are getting xtra fed reimbursements for covid19 deaths! Guess what that means??? Too many hospital deaths misreported as from covid19 when from other unrelated pulmonary morbidities...The swamp’s own bureaucracy along with the willing private partners at work. Our$$$
